trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the "SourceChanged" event on specific listener elements.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理特定侦听器元素上的"SourceChanged"事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The "SourceChanged" event that this delegate represents handlers for is not exposed as a public [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event, as is the case with most routed events.
trans-unit.target: 此委托表示的处理程序的"SourceChanged"事件未公开为公共[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件，这与最路由事件的情况相同。

trans-unit.source: Instead, "SourceChanged" is a routed event that remains private to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is direct routed.
trans-unit.target: 相反，"SourceChanged"是保持私有的路由的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基础结构，并直接路由。

trans-unit.source: Because it is direct routed, `sender` and the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data are always the same object.
trans-unit.target: 因为它是直接路由，`sender`和<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>在事件数据始终是相同的对象。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add and remove handlers to this event despite the private access level of the event itself by using the public methods <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加和移除事件本身的私有访问级别尽管此事件的处理程序使用的公共方法<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A> </xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `sender` of the event will be a derived class of <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource>.
